sqlMap.select: SELECT A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_SJ, A.QUSTNR_PURPS, A.QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QUSTNR_BGNDE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QUSTNR_ENDDE, A.QUSTNR_TRGET, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, (SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID) QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNQESTNRINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND QESTNR_ID = #qestnrId#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1) / #pageSize# + 1) PAGE FROM (
SELECT A.QESTNR_ID AS "qestnrId", A.QUSTNR_SJ AS "qestnrSj", A.QUSTNR_PURPS AS "qestnrPurps", A.QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN AS "qestnrWritngGuidanceCn", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "qestnrBeginDe", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "qestnrEndDe", A.QUSTNR_TRGET AS "qestnrTrget", A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS "qestnrTmplatId", A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm", A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNQESTNRINFO A WHERE 1=1
AND QUSTNR_SJ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%') )
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) Z WHERE PAGE = #pageIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM LETTNQESTNRINFO WHERE 1=1
AND QUSTNR_SJ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND FRST_REGISTER_ID IN (SELECT ESNTL_ID FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE USER_NM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#), '%') )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LETTNQESTNRINFO SET QUSTNR_SJ=#qestnrSj#, QUSTNR_PURPS=#qestnrPurps#, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID=#qestnrTmplatId#, QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN=#qestnrWritngGuidanceCn#, QUSTNR_BGNDE=REPLACE(#qestnrBeginDe#,'-',''), QUSTNR_TRGET=#qestnrTrget#, QUSTNR_ENDDE=REPLACE(#qestnrEndDe#,'-',''), LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATETIME, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE QESTNR_ID = #qestnrId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_SJ QESTNR_SJ, A.QUSTNR_PURPS QESTNR_PURPS, A.QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN AS "qestnrWritngGuidanceCn", TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_BGNDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QESTNR_BEGIN_DE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.QUSTNR_ENDDE, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') QESTNR_END_DE, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.QUSTNR_TRGET QESTNR_TRGET, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID QESTNR_TMPLAT_ID, (SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID) QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY FROM LETTNQESTNRINFO A WHERE 1=1 AND QESTNR_ID = #qestnrId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO LETTNQESTNRINFO ( QESTNR_ID, QUSTNR_SJ, QUSTNR_PURPS, QUSTNR_WRITNG_GUIDANCE_CN, QUSTNR_BGNDE, QUSTNR_ENDDE, QUSTNR_TRGET, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #qestnrId#, #qestnrSj#, #qestnrPurps#, #qestnrWritngGuidanceCn#, REPLACE(#qestnrBeginDe#,'-',''), REPLACE(#qestnrEndDe#,'-',''), #qestnrTrget#, #qestnrTmplatId#, SYSDATETIME, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATETIME, #lastUpdusrId# )
